text: The Vels () is a river in Perm Krai, Russia, a left tributary of the Vishera. It is long, and its drainage basin covers .«Река Велс», Russian State Water Registry It starts on the east slope of Mount Isherim, in the Vishera Nature Reserve. Its mouth is near the settlement of Vels. It is a mountain river with rapid flow. There are some small rocks along its banks downstream of Posmak River. Main tributaries: *Left: Bolshaya Martayka, Posmak, Chural, Shchudya *Right: only small insignificant rivers == References == == External links == *www.uraltravel.com Category:Rivers of Perm Krai
title: Vels (river)
